Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: emit socket events when stories are created, updated, or deleted

Stories were only persisted via REST but never broadcast through
Socket.io, so other users in the room never saw new stories and
couldn''t vote on them. Added STORY_ADDED, STORY_UPDATED, and
STORY_DELETED emissions after each mutation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: serialize Prisma Date fields before emitting story events

Prisma returns Date objects for createdAt/updatedAt but the shared
Story type expects ISO strings. This caused a type mismatch when
broadcasting story events via Socket.io.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
